name: CalixSmartRouter
0:
”Alexa open my router”
”Alexa ask my router how many devices are on the network”
”Alexa ask my router to check my speed”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my router
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Calix Smart Home can control Calix based smart routers, brands and types of smart devices via voice commands. Router activities such as speed test, last device connected and connected device count can be invoked with the skill.

Users are required to bind Calix Smart Home to their Calix accounts when they use Calix Smart Home for the first time. Kindly ensure the Calix account must have been added to at least one smart router.
